application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Discharge of Planning Conditions 9 (Landscaping Scheme) and 10 (Nature Conservation Scheme) of Planning Permission ref: 22/01964/FUL (Change of use of existing school building (Use Class F.1) to Child Nursery (Use Class E(f)) and associated minor external works) dated 14/06/2022.
site_name: Former Kingston Community School 204 Acre RoadKingston Upon ThamesKT2 6EU
decision_conditions: Through the inappropriate siting of swift boxes and insufficient detail and specifications of nature conservation enhancements, it not been demonstrated that the biodiversity and nature conservation value of the site would be safeguarded, as such the proposal would not accord with policy G6 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS3 and DM6 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Insufficient details have been provided to demonstrate that a satisfactory landscaping scheme is being provided and to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development. The proposal is therefore in conflict with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
